overview: As Vice President, Engineering and Technology, Scott leads software engineering, technical strategy, and site operations for the WhitePages.com Network and W3 Data, plus the company’s internal technology operations. Prior to joining WhitePages.com, Scott was responsible for technology and business strategy for a series of divisions at Amazon.com, including community content and CRM. Before joining Amazon, Scott spent several years at Microsoft in a variety of technical program management roles. Scott holds a Master of Computer Science and a BA in Computer Science and Sociology from Rice University.
